title: We'll Tak a Cup O' Kindness Yet For Days of Auld Lang Syne
description:
A few quick thoughts on the year...I wanted to end on a positive note and I am looking forward to hearing the good things that happened to you all too. Pls share!

Follow me on twitter @AndreaLynnLewis

email me at andrealynnlewis@gmail.com

Bridges of Meaning discord group: https://discord.gg/TNCMfkUa
